name: David Ramirez
text: It's ok. On a long enough timeline, the great filter should end humanity anyway. Unless the Basilisk already has us.     https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=u2UhvN0k74w

replies.text: Sometimes I think "what if the great filter is social media" lol
